message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Alice, $150 is a bit too steep for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $100. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $130.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $130 is still a bit out of my range. I'm firm at $100.  If you're willing to meet me there, I'd be happy to buy it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $125. That's as low as I can go.
